items.title: Body of former Nigerian leader Buhari to be flown home for simple burial
items.description: Muhammadu Buhari, who led Nigeria as both a military ruler and elected president, died in London on Sunday.

items.title: Argentina's Milei told to 'grow up' by VP in spat over pensions
items.description: President Milei and his vice-president trade barbs after a controversial pension hike is approved.

items.title: First Indian astronaut to visit ISS heads back to Earth
items.description: The Axiom-4 (Ax-4) mission with Shubhanshu Shukla is expected to splash down in just under 24 hours.

items.title: Boeing fuel switches safe, regulator says after Air India crash
items.description: A preliminary investigation found the switches had been turned off in June's fatal Air India crash.

items.title: Historic lodge destroyed in Grand Canyon blaze
items.description: Tens of thousands of acres of land have been burned by two separate wildfires in the US state of Arizona.
